text: Miller's Crossing is a 1990 mystery crime drama thriller movie by Coen brothers. Gabriel Byrne plays Tom Reagan, Marcia Gay Harden plays Verna Bernbaum, and Frances McDormand plays a secretary. The subject in the movie is Mafia related issues and crimes. The movie was released in September 1990 in the United States. The budget was over $14 million. Miller's Crossing earned back only $5 million. However, the movie was critically praised. Category:1990 crime thriller movies Category:1990s English-language movies
title: Miller's Crossing
